A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Johnson allowed me to forget about Jarr Jarr\, trade federations & sand dislikes; not in a good way. Finn's storyline was pointless\, Snoke was pointless & Luke's story arch was barely passable. At least Obi-wan went out swinging in person\, come on. BB-8\, I enjoyed but the main heroes have to get themselves out of trouble sometimes. The only good fight scene with lightsabers in it was way too short but good. I feel better about J.J. coming back & confused about why Disney would green light A WHOLE TRILOLOGY BY JOHNSON. I feel bad about making my friends and family loose sleep to see it last night. Shame on you R. Johnson & Disney- you're killing my childhood & taking my money at the same time.
